channel.title: EvoCheat
channel.description:
A new community by me. It's a general RS forum, but also an RS cheating community. Yeah, yeah, by now 3/4 of the users reading this have X'd out because they think it's another one of those copies of Mopar. Well, it's not. Evo focuses on a different topic, and we hope to be the home to both legit and "other" RS lifestyles (fun minigames and such, as well as things to suit your "other" needs). ;) This community is the future home of a new BCEL bot named Pivot. If all goes well, it will be very user-friendly, productive, and a great learning experience to users who are entering into BCEL at the same time. If you're interested in RS, programming, or GFX, it's a place to at least check out.
[url=http://www.evocheat.com/]EvoCheat[/url]
Side-note:
Yes, it's been approved by Mopar. And I didn't post it into the Approved Websites thread because (as Silab said herself) it hasn't been updated in ages, so I decided this was a better way to let people know about it.

item.title: EvoCheat
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

goatee:

Hmmm the template doesn’t seem very runescapey.

I’d rather not have the template seem very game-ish.

[quote=“usernamelol, post:4, topic:64372”]Glad to see Mr.Chris hosting you. I’ll join for the fun

The skin is not that good in my opinion though.[/quote]

Chris owns, end of story lol.

The homepage is still obviously under work, but the forums should be pretty stable. The forum template ordeal isn’t settled down yet. I like the MESH theme, but it needs some editing. The current default theme is ok, but seems to lack uniqueness, and it needs some CSS.

Read full topic
